languages.text: "При других обстоятельствах, Ваша Светлость, я бы не дерзнул ослушаться вас, но боюсь, в этой ситуации нам необходимо наказать виновных. Саботаж логистических цепочек в столице вашей династии закономерно сказался на сборе податей — сюда вот-вот прибудет светлейший Адептус Арбитес, чтобы разобраться в этом. К сожалению, его внимание представляет угрозу как лично вам, так и всему протекторату. Но мы все еще можем смягчить его гнев, разобравшись во всем самостоятельно и наказав виновных".

traits.locale_text: "При других обстоятельствах, Ваша Светлость, я бы не дерзнул ослушаться вас, но боюсь, в этой ситуации нам необходимо наказать виновных. Саботаж логистических цепочек в столице вашей династии закономерно сказался на сборе податей — сюда вот-вот прибудет светлейший Адептус Арбитр, чтобы разобраться в этом. К сожалению, его внимание представляет угрозу как лично вам, так и всему протекторату. Но мы все еще можем смягчить его гнев, разобравшись во всем самостоятельно и наказав виновных".
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Under different circumstances, I would not have dared disobey your word, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I am afraid that this situation demands that the guilty receive their due punishment. This sabotage of logistical chains perpetrated on the capital world of your dynasty has naturally had an effect on tithe collection. The most honourable representative of the Adeptus Arbites will be here before long to investigate the matter. Alas, their attention puts both you personally and the entire protectorate at risk. However, we still have a chance to alleviate their displeasure by resolving this incident ourselves and punishing the culprits."
languages.original_text: "При других обстоятельствах, Ваша Светлость, я бы не дерзнул ослушаться вас, но боюсь, в этой ситуации нам необходимо наказать виновных. Саботаж логистических цепочек в столице вашей династии закономерно сказался на сборе податей — сюда вот-вот прибудет светлейший Адептус Арбитес, чтобы разобраться в этом. К сожалению, его внимание представляет угрозу как лично вам, так и всему протекторату. Но мы все еще можем смягчить его гнев, разобравшись во всем самостоятельно и наказав виновных".

The most honourable representative of the Adeptus Arbites will be here before long to investigate the matter. Alas, their attention puts both you personally and the entire protectorate at risk. However, we still have a chance to alleviate their displeasure by resolving this incident ourselves and punishing the culprits."

languages.text: “若是在其他情况下，我断然不敢违背您的命令。但我担心在目前的情况下，最好还是让有罪之人得到相应的惩罚。王朝首都的物流链遭到了破坏，什一税的征收工作也自然受到了影响。恐怕用不了多久，法务部最尊贵的代表就会前来此地，彻底调查这件事情。遗憾的是，一旦引起了那些人的注意，那恐怕您本人与您的整个王朝都会陷入风险之中。不过，我们说不定有机会自行解决这个事情，惩罚相关的肇事者，缓解法务部的不满。”
languages.original_text: "Under different circumstances, I would not have dared disobey your word, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I am afraid that this situation demands that the guilty receive their due punishment. This sabotage of logistical chains perpetrated on the capital world of your dynasty has naturally had an effect on tithe collection. The most honourable representative of the Adeptus Arbites will be here before long to investigate the matter. Alas, their attention puts both you personally and the entire protectorate at risk. However, we still have a chance to alleviate their displeasure by resolving this incident ourselves and punishing the culprits."

traits.locale_text: “若是在其他情况下，我断然不敢违背您的命令。但我担心在目前的情况下，最好还是让有罪之人得到相应的惩罚。王朝首都的物流链遭到了破坏，什一税的征收工作也自然受到了影响。恐怕用不了多久，法务部最尊贵的代表就会前来此地，彻底调查这件事情。遗憾的是，一旦引起了那些人的注意，那恐怕您本人与您的整个王朝都会陷入风险之中。不过，我们说不定有机会自行解决这个事情，惩罚相关的肇事者，缓解法务部的不满。”
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Unter anderen Umständen hätte ich es nicht gewagt, mich Eurem Wort zu widersetzen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, doch ich fürchte, die Situation erfordert, dass die Schuldigen ihre gebührende Strafe erhalten. Die Sabotage der Logistikkette auf der Hauptwelt Eurer Dynastie hatte natürlich auch Auswirkungen auf die Eintreibung der Tribute. Der ehrenwerte Vertreter der Adeptus Arbites wird früher oder später hier erscheinen, um die Angelegenheit zu untersuchen. Diese Aufmerksamkeit gefährdet leider sowohl Euch persönlich als auch das gesamte Protektorat. Wir können die Wogen aber noch glätten, indem wir diesen Zwischenfall selbst klären und die Täter bestrafen."
languages.original_text: "Under different circumstances, I would not have dared disobey your word, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I am afraid that this situation demands that the guilty receive their due punishment. This sabotage of logistical chains perpetrated on the capital world of your dynasty has naturally had an effect on tithe collection. The most honourable representative of the Adeptus Arbites will be here before long to investigate the matter. Alas, their attention puts both you personally and the entire protectorate at risk. However, we still have a chance to alleviate their displeasure by resolving this incident ourselves and punishing the culprits."

traits.locale_text: "Unter anderen Umständen hätte ich es nicht gewagt, mich Eurem Wort zu widersetzen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, doch ich fürchte, die Situation erfordert, dass die Schuldigen ihre gebührende Strafe erhalten. Die Sabotage der Logistikkette auf der Hauptwelt Eurer Dynastie hatte natürlich auch Auswirkungen auf die Eintreibung der Tribute. Der ehrenwerte Vertreter der Adeptus Arbites wird früher oder später hier erscheinen, um die Angelegenheit zu untersuchen. Diese Aufmerksamkeit gefährdet leider sowohl Euch persönlich als auch das gesamte Protektorat. Wir können die Wogen aber noch glätten, indem wir diesen Zwischenfall selbst klären und die Täter bestrafen."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: « Dans d'autres circonstances, je n'aurais jamais osé vous désobéir, Votre Seigneurie, mais la situation est telle que je n'ai pas d'autre choix : les coupables doivent être châtiés. Ce sabotage volontaire des chaînes logistiques du monde-capitale de votre dynastie a bien évidemment freiné la collecte des dîmes. L'honorable représentant de l'Adeptus Arbites sera bientôt là pour mener l'enquête, mais je crains que cela vous mette en danger, vous et votre protectorat. Cependant, il nous est toujours possible de limiter les dégâts en résolvant cet incident nous-mêmes et en punissant ceux qui le méritent. »
languages.original_text: "Under different circumstances, I would not have dared disobey your word, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I am afraid that this situation demands that the guilty receive their due punishment. This sabotage of logistical chains perpetrated on the capital world of your dynasty has naturally had an effect on tithe collection. The most honourable representative of the Adeptus Arbites will be here before long to investigate the matter. Alas, their attention puts both you personally and the entire protectorate at risk. However, we still have a chance to alleviate their displeasure by resolving this incident ourselves and punishing the culprits."

traits.locale_text: « Dans d'autres circonstances, je n'aurais jamais osé vous désobéir, Votre Seigneurie, mais la situation est telle que je n'ai pas d'autre choix : les coupables doivent être châtiés. Ce sabotage volontaire des chaînes logistiques du monde-capitale de votre dynastie a bien évidemment freiné la collecte des dîmes. L'honorable représentant de l'Adeptus Arbites sera bientôt là pour mener l'enquête, mais je crains que cela vous mette en danger, vous et votre protectorat. Cependant, il nous est toujours possible de limiter les dégâts en résolvant cet incident nous-mêmes et en punissant ceux qui le méritent. »
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: «En otras circunstancias no me atrevería a desobedecerle, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero me temo que en la situación exige que la parte culpable reciba su justo castigo. Este sabotaje de nuestras cadenas logísticas del mundo capital ha afectado a la recolección de diezmos, como cabría esperar, y pronto llegará un honorable representante del Adeptus Arbites. Su presencia pone en riesgo tanto a su persona como al protectorado entero, pero tenemos la ocasión de aliviar su reacción si resolvemos el incidente nosotros mismos y castigamos a los culpables».
languages.original_text: "Under different circumstances, I would not have dared disobey your word, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I am afraid that this situation demands that the guilty receive their due punishment. This sabotage of logistical chains perpetrated on the capital world of your dynasty has naturally had an effect on tithe collection. The most honourable representative of the Adeptus Arbites will be here before long to investigate the matter. Alas, their attention puts both you personally and the entire protectorate at risk. However, we still have a chance to alleviate their displeasure by resolving this incident ourselves and punishing the culprits."

traits.locale_text: «En otras circunstancias no me atrevería a desobedecerle, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero me temo que en la situación exige que la parte culpable reciba su justo castigo. Este sabotaje de nuestras cadenas logísticas del mundo capital ha afectado a la recolección de diezmos, como cabría esperar, y pronto llegará un honorable representante del Adeptus Arbites. Su presencia pone en riesgo tanto a su persona como al protectorado entero, pero tenemos la ocasión de aliviar su reacción si resolvemos el incidente nosotros mismos y castigamos a los culpables».
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: 「状況が違っていたら、あなたの言葉に逆らいはしなかったでしょう、閣下。しかし、今の状況では、罪を犯した者が相応の罰を受けるべきだと思います。あなた方の王朝の首都惑星で起こった物流チェーンの妨害行為は、勿論什分の一の徴収にも影響を及ぼしてました。高等裁定局で一番名誉のある代表が、まもなく、この問題を調査しに来られるでしょう。残念ながら、彼への注目は、あなた自身と保護領全体を危険にさらすことになります。しかしながら、我々は自らこの事件を解決し、犯人を罰することも可能です。そうすれば、彼らの不快感を和らげる事が出来るかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "Under different circumstances, I would not have dared disobey your word, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I am afraid that this situation demands that the guilty receive their due punishment. This sabotage of logistical chains perpetrated on the capital world of your dynasty has naturally had an effect on tithe collection. The most honourable representative of the Adeptus Arbites will be here before long to investigate the matter. Alas, their attention puts both you personally and the entire protectorate at risk. However, we still have a chance to alleviate their displeasure by resolving this incident ourselves and punishing the culprits."

traits.locale_text: 「状況が違っていたら、あなたの言葉に逆らいはしなかったでしょう、閣下。しかし、今の状況では、罪を犯した者が相応の罰を受けるべきだと思います。あなた方の王朝の首都惑星で起こった物流チェーンの妨害行為は、勿論什分の一の徴収にも影響を及ぼしてました。高等裁定局で一番名誉のある代表が、まもなく、この問題を調査しに来られるでしょう。残念ながら、彼への注目は、あなた自身と保護領全体を危険にさらすことになります。しかしながら、我々は自らこの事件を解決し、犯人を罰することも可能です。そうすれば、彼らの不快感を和らげる事が出来るかもしれません」
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, başka şartlar altında sözünüze asla karşı gelmezdim. Fakat korkarım bu durumda suçluların cezasını çekmesi gerekmekte. Hanedanınızın başdünyasındaki lojistik hatların sabote edilmesi, aşar tahsilatını da etkiledi. Adeptus Arbites'in en muhterem temsilcisi, meseleyi soruşturmak için yakında burada olacak. Demem o ki bu vaziyet, hem sizin şahsınızı hem de tüm protektorayı tehlikeye atmakta. Ancak meseleyi bizzat çözüp failleri cezalandırarak mevcut hoşnutsuzlukları giderebiliriz."
languages.original_text: "Under different circumstances, I would not have dared disobey your word, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but I am afraid that this situation demands that the guilty receive their due punishment. This sabotage of logistical chains perpetrated on the capital world of your dynasty has naturally had an effect on tithe collection. The most honourable representative of the Adeptus Arbites will be here before long to investigate the matter. Alas, their attention puts both you personally and the entire protectorate at risk. However, we still have a chance to alleviate their displeasure by resolving this incident ourselves and punishing the culprits."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, başka şartlar altında sözünüze asla karşı gelmezdim. Fakat korkarım bu durumda suçluların cezasını çekmesi gerekmekte. Hanedanınızın başdünyasında lojistik hatların baltalanmasıyla aşar tahsilatı da etkilendi. Adeptus Arbites'in en muhterem temsilcisi meseleyi soruşturmak için yakında burada olacak. Demem o ki bu vaziyet, hem sizin şahsınızı hem de tüm protektorayı tehlikeye atmakta. Ancak meseleyi bizzat çözüp failleri cezalandırarak hoşnutsuzluklarını giderebiliriz."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor
